column1: Heesch (Dutch pronunciation: [ɦeːs]) is a village without city rights in the Dutch province of North Brabant. Heesch is next to the village Vinkel. It is located in the municipality of Bernheze
column2: about 3 km south of Oss. Heesch was a separate municipality until 1994
column3: when it merged with Heeswijk-Dinther and Nistelrode. The new municipality was originally called "Heesch"
column4: but changed its name to "Bernheze" in 1995.
